Posts.Content: hi  i have only just joined this site tonight and already feel the support, im 34, married with 3 children and i was diagnosed on 14th feb 2014, with primary breast cancer i have appointment in a weeks time but dont know anything apart from that so like you im feeling exactly the same shocked, numb, scared,infact every emotion going, when was you diagnosed? with the strength and support from every1 on here, im sure we will feel we are not alone. message me anytime, we can get through this together x traci x
Posts.Title: Just been diagnosed and feeling numb

Posts.Content: hi, thanks for ur support its so nice to know im not alone, im new on this site and im not sure how u friend request but i would love 2, how long ago was you diagnosed? virtual hugs back x
Posts.Title: just diagnosed with breast cancer,need support

Posts.Content: hi davinia, thanks for the reply for the first time in days, i have a warm feeling inside, knowing that im not alone in this battle, you are a truly inspiring person WOW!!! your acheievments are amazing, and there was me thinking how am i going to be that normal person i used 2 be. its good to know we were almost the same age when we were diagnosed, you truley know how i must be feeling, i dont seem 2 know what happens next they said about surgery when i was diagnosed, but wont know anything till next tuseday, thats when my next appointment is, thanks again for taking the time to message me. what stage are you at now with the cancer? traci x
Posts.Title: just diagnosed with breast cancer,need support

Posts.Content: thanks for that. i can feel inside the difference this site is making to me already thank you x
Posts.Title: just diagnosed with breast cancer,need support

Posts.Content: thank you for your messages and support it really has helped me tonight and will defo be back on here anytime i need a boost thank you again, wishing you all the best for the future traci x
Posts.Title: just diagnosed with breast cancer,need support

Posts.Content: hi, it feels good 2 have someone to b able to talk 2 ,it feels so strange that im actually in this situation, and struggling to come to terms with the CANCER diagnosis, i was diagnosed with primary breast cancer on friday and my next appointment is in a weeks time!!!! which dosent seem fair!!! all i know that is i will be having surgery in a few weeks then start treatment but have no idea what treatment, they mentioned chemo, but it all seemed like a was dreaming (a bad dream) they took some cells from near my armpit 2 but i dont know the outcome.
Posts.Title: just diagnosed with breast cancer,need support

Posts.Content: im 34  just diagnosed and mum of 3 i need advice and support on how to cope.
Posts.Title: just diagnosed with breast cancer,need support
